txt.en: 'Ah, perfect! These are exactly what I was hoping for. Thank you so much for your help!'

'Tam does so much for me, and he has been fretting over me ever since we crossed over into Cardolan. I am looking forward to making him a nice pair of leather breeches once you bring me those avanc hides.'
You should bring the avanc hides to Etta Yewberry.\n\nEtta is in Stonecrop Encampment, north of Tharbad.
Etta Yewberry has asked you to bring her hides from the avanc who make the watery pools north of Tharbad their homes.
The many pools of Sedgemead are home to dangerous avanc, whose thick hides make for fine leather.

'Well met! Do not mind my pacing. I find myself restless being confined to these crumbled walls. My husband, Tam, did not want us to make this trip, and now it seems he was right to worry!\n\n'I want to make him a new pair of breeches, but our hunter is otherwise occupied. If you head north, will you bring me hides from the avanc that lurk in the watery pools?'
